entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 4:28 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or ice pellets with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
